alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 16 at 2:58AM CST until February 16 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central Stone County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Izard County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 345 AM CST. * At 258 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Culp, or 15 miles northwest of Mountain View, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Melbourne... Calico Rock... Oxford... Pineville... Culp... Wideman... Gorby... Barkshed Campground... Sylamore Shooting Range... Optimus... Brockwell... Boswell... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
